dmca.title: seoimage.com complains to Google about multiple pages
dmca.body:
Dear Google Customer Support Professionals,

1)	The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on: http://www.seoimaqe.com/

2)	Search Query:
"offers three powerful and effective marketing services"
http://www.gooqle.com/search?q=%22offers%20three%20powerful%20and%20effective%20marke ting%20services%22&sourceid=groowe&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8
Infringing Web Pages: http://www.daytech.net/

3)	My Contact Information: [private]@seoimage.com 
[private](cell)

4)	Infringer's Contact Information:
[private]
[private],
Ramat Gan 52521, IL.
Telephone: [private]
FAX:	[private]
httpi/www.daytech.net/davtech/contact.asp

5)	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6)	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,
[private]CEO SEO Image LLC
[private]
Kings Park, NY 11754
<hr>

October 25, 2005
Sender Information:
SEO Image LLC
Sent by: CEO
[private]
Kings Park, NY, 11754, USA

Customer Support, DMCA Complaints Google, Inc.
Mountain View, CA, 94043, USA

Sent via: fax
